exploreUrl:
<js>
const data = [
    "玄幻魔法",
    "修真武侠",
    "言情小说",
    "历史军事",
    "游戏竞技",
    "科幻空间",
    "悬疑惊悚",
    "同人小说",
    "都市小说",
    "官场职场",
    "穿越时空",
    "青春校园"
];

let categorys = [];
const status = ["连载", "全本"];

for (let i of status) {
    categorys.push({
        title: i,
        url: `/ranking?status=${i}&page={{page}}`,
        style: {
            layout_flexGrow: 1,
            layout_flexBasisPercent: 1
        }
    });
    
    for (let j of data) {
        categorys.push({
            title: j,
            url: `/ranking?category=${j}&status=${i}&page={{page}}`,
            style: {
                layout_flexGrow: 1,
                layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.25
            }
        });
    }
}

categorys.push({
    title: "最新",
    url: "/ranking?new=1&page={{page}}",
    style: {
        layout_flexGrow: 1,
        layout_flexBasisPercent: 1
    }
});

for (let j of data) {
    categorys.push({
        title: j,
        url: `/ranking?category=${j}&new=1&page={{page}}`,
        style: {
            layout_flexGrow: 1,
            layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.25
        }
    });
}

categorys.push({
    title: "字数",
    url: "/ranking?wordNumber=1&page={{page}}",
    style: {
        layout_flexGrow: 1,
        layout_flexBasisPercent: 1
    }
});

for (let j of data) {
    categorys.push({
        title: j,
        url: `/ranking?category=${j}&wordNumber=1&page={{page}}`,
        style: {
            layout_flexGrow: 1,
            layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.25
        }
    });
}

JSON.stringify(categorys);
</js>
